* PHPRouter version:
* PHP version<!--- (e.g. PHP 5.6, HHVM 3)-->:
* Exact steps to cause this issue
    1. First I did this...
    2. Then...
* What you expected
    * e.g. I expected *abc* to *xyz*
* What happened instead
    * e.g. Instead, I got *zyx* and PHPRouter burn my server

Thank you!
